BUSINESS CONTEXT.Current challenges/pain points: Hacked bank account, unable to set up auto-pay, delayed check payments

outstanding_action_items: customer to cancel Bank of America check process

relationship_health.trust_level_signals: Low due to past security issues
relationship_health.rapport_quality: Functional but strained due to past issues

customer_journey_stage.expansion_opportunities: Limited unless security concerns are addressed

retention_factors.risk_indicators: Security concerns and past negative experiences
retention_factors.loyalty_signals: Willingness to continue payment under adjusted terms
retention_factors.advocacy_potential: Low unless overall experience improves significantly

communication_preferences.decision-making_patterns: Prefers manual control over automated processes

key_quotes: But the company continues to demand me leave my payment information in their system, and I will not do that. I cannot do that, and it's simply because my bank won't pay it.
Since my wife was killed, I've been hacked. Four years after she died, she spent $800,000.
My bank will – I mean, I had another one today. Okay. As a matter of fact, my water bill was exactly – Yeah, it should have been for a car but not require auto pay.

the banker finally told me, he said, Hugh, if they've got your information, they've got your information. He doesn't – he stopped changing banks and accounts. He's not doing anything. They've got you. He got me through her.

qa_pairs.question: Can you turn off the requirement to save my payment information?
qa_pairs.answer: I have that turned off for you now so it won't require that you save it.

qa_pairs.question: Can you terminate the check process?
qa_pairs.answer: I will go in there and see if I can terminate that check process because it's really delayed like September 30th.

qa_pairs.question: Is auto pay turned off?
qa_pairs.answer: the auto pay was turned off from what I saw. But the required stored card was not.
